data.text: @5_News They were 'safety measures' not restrictions, designed to help make us 'safe'. We should have kept masks, social distancing. Yes, we have to get some normality but, we must protect the vunerable & each other, the measures were relaxed far too soon, science told us not to!
@5_News Cases rising here in Swansea and it's more like the delta variant now, with fever and change in taste and smell being the most common symptoms

@5_News As someone who is in the at risk category, yes the Government relaxed the rules at least a Month to early as Boris Johnson will do anything to save himself and now we have a War going on he'll be hoping everyone has forgotten about it completely
@5_News We just keep re-infecting ourselves and the April Fool rules will create dead people walking.

@5_News The Government has always been premature in lifting safety measures which are very different to lockdown. Living with it, should mean safety measures stay in place until infection rates drop and a good indication is a low % in ICU hospitals.
@5_News I'm fed up hearing about Corona virus, just let us get on with life. It Depresses me more, I've had enough.

@5_News Right from the start we should have been encouraged to live despite #Covid19 rather than live with it. Live with social respect rather than social distancing.
What was the purpose of lockdown when we, as a society, had already repressed the spread of this obnoxious virus.
